players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked that Diana was killed on the first night. We should all share any suspicions we have."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is mafia. We should vote him out immediately."
Bob: "That's ridiculous, Charlie. I'm not the mafia—maybe you're just trying to deflect suspicion from yourself."
You: "I think Charlie's investigation is credible. We should vote for Bob to protect the town."
Charlie: "Alice is right. My investigation is clear: Bob is mafia. We must vote him out to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
